name: Curse of Infinity
description:
The curse of infinite curses applies a random new curse every 10 seconds until you die. How long can you live?

Game and all assets created by Kilan Sky Larsen for the Ludum Dare 51 game jam in 48 hours!

Gamepad controls are supported and recommended!

Move: WASD, Arrows, Joysick

Interact/Shoot: E, Spacebar, Gamepad South/West buttons

Tools used: Unity, Photoshop, MagicaVoxel, DoTweenPro
